name: 涂淑惠
objective:
1. 二極體電路分析與設計2. 電晶體電路分析與設計3. FET電路分析與設計4. 放大器頻率響應分析及頻率補償5. 功率放大器分析與設計6. 回授放大器分析與設計7. 差動及運算放大器分析與設計8. 震盪器分析與設計9. 主動濾波器分析與設計
1. Diode circuit Analysis and Design2. Transistor circuit Analysis and Design3. Transistor circuit Analysis and Design4. FET circuit Analysis and Design5. Amplifier Frequency response Analysis and Componstaion6. Power Amplifier Analysis and Design7. Feedback Amplifier Analysis and Design8. Differential and Operational Amplifier Analysis and Design9. Oscillator Analysis and Design10. Active Filter Analysis and Design
schedule:
Weeks 1-3 Transistor circuit Analysis and Design (電晶體電路分析與設計)
Weeks 4-5 Cascode Amplifiers and Current Mirrors (疊接放大器與電流鏡) 
Weeks 6-8 Analysis and Design of Differential Amplifiers (差動放大器分析與設計)
Week 9   Midterm exam (期中考試)
Weeks 10-11 Frequency Response and Compensation of Amplifiers (放大器頻率響應分析及頻率補償)
Week 12-14  Analytical Synthesis of Oscillators (震盪器分析與設計)
Weeks 15-17 Reference Circuits and Operational Amplifiers (參考電路與運算放大器分析與設計)
Week 18 Final exam (期末考試)
scorePolicy:
Quiz 20% (問答測驗)
Midterm Exam 40% (期中考試)
Final Exam 40% (期末考試)
materials:
1. Sedra/Smith “Microelectronic Circuits”
2. B. Razavi  “Design of Analog CMOS Integrated Circuits”
3. Integrated Circuit Design by Neil H. E. Weste and David Money Harris, 4/e
